name: Firecracker Red Pepper Flake Chicken
instructions: 2. In a small bowl, mix together a generous amount of red pepper flakes with a pinch of salt.
3. Rub the chicken breast with the red pepper flakes mixture, ensuring it is evenly coated.
4. Place the chicken breast on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
5. Bake the chicken in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
6. Remove from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.
description: Firecracker Red Pepper Flake Chicken is a spicy and flavorful chicken dish that is sure to tantalize your taste buds. The chicken breast is coated with a mixture of fiery red pepper flakes, creating a burst of heat with every bite. It's a simple yet satisfying dish for those who love a touch of spice.
